description: Tetsuya is Juohmaru`s mechanic, responsible for fine tuning him, upgrading him and repairing him, especially during the minute-long break between a battle`s rounds. He is shown to be very capable, a quick thinker and an innovator, although at times he has taken offence at Sanshiro overriding him for Juohmaru`s maintenance.
name: Hasegawa Tetsuya
